.@twdb_Carlos: Application process is open until Feb. 3, 2015. We urge communities to apply for #SWIFT funding.

.@drewdarby4tx: We intend to take care of rural Texas with #SWIFT & develop and fund projects in smaller communities.
.@drewdarby4tx: It’s up to local communities, non-profit water systems, & political subdivisions to do their part & apply for #SWIFT.
.@drewdarby4tx: The @twdb traveled across TX, worked with stakeholders & adopted #SWIFT rules ahead of time!
.@twdb_Carlos: #SWIFT sets aside AT LEAST 10% of its funding for rural & ag projects, & AT LEAST 20% for water cons & reuse projects.
.@twdb_Carlos: Local communities know what the best solutions are for their #txwater needs.
.@twdb_Carlos: #SWIFT will finance approx. $800M worth of #txwater projects every year in the next 10 yrs.
